experience.title: Co-Founder, FlexiDip
responsibilities: Developed minimum viable product (MVP) capable of early-stage revenue generation.
Validated startup idea through market research and interview feedback as a part of Launch-X U-Michigan.
Received positive feedback from established brands like Buffalo Wild Wings for innovative sauce holder designs.

experience.title: Private Math Tutor
responsibilities: Provided personalized tutoring sessions in algebra, calculus, and geometry to elementary & middle-school students.
Developed lesson plans for diverse learning styles, leading to improvements by upwards of 1.5 letter grades.
Awarded National Junior Honor Society for outstanding achievements in academics, leadership, and community service.
